rsciinema 0.0.0.9000
  • Reference

Simulate evaluation of code

asciicast.Rd

Simulate evaluation of code

asciicast(
  input,
  envir = parent.frame(),
  speed = 0.1,
  version = 1,
  cols = 80,
  rows = 24,
  title = "",
  ...
)

as.asciicast(data, version = 1, cols = 80, rows = 24, title = "")

Arguments

input

see [evaluate::evaluate()]
envir

see [evaluate::evaluate()]
speed

average number of seconds used to type 1 character
version

version of the asciicast format
cols

terminal output width
rows

terminal output height
title

title of the ascii cast
...

additional arguments to pass to [evaluate::evaluate()]
data

a data.frame or tibble to convert to an asciicast

Examples

if (FALSE) {
asciicast( "# a comment\niris %>% \n  dplyr::group_by(Species) %>%\n  dplyr::summarise_all(mean)" )
}
input = paste0("library(magrittr); # a comment ",
"\niris %>% \n  dplyr::group_by(Species) %>%\n  ",
"dplyr::summarise_all(mean) \n # a new line")
df = asciicast(input)
as.asciicast(df)
#> <ascii cast duration=11.08> 
#> # A tibble: 112 x 4
#>    input_id   time text                    type  
#>  *    <dbl>  <dbl> <chr>                   <chr> 
#>  1        1 0.0581 "\u001b[31ml\u001b[39m" source
#>  2        1 0.133  "\u001b[31mi\u001b[39m" source
#>  3        1 0.110  "\u001b[31mb\u001b[39m" source
#>  4        1 0.0657 "\u001b[31mr\u001b[39m" source
#>  5        1 0.0507 "\u001b[31ma\u001b[39m" source
#>  6        1 0.0966 "\u001b[31mr\u001b[39m" source
#>  7        1 0.0998 "\u001b[31my\u001b[39m" source
#>  8        1 0.0790 "("                     source
#>  9        1 0.123  "m"                     source
#> 10        1 0.127  "a"                     source
#> # … with 102 more rows
as.asciicast(as.data.frame(df))
#> <ascii cast duration=11.08> 
#> # A tibble: 112 x 4
#>    input_id   time text                    type  
#>  *    <dbl>  <dbl> <chr>                   <chr> 
#>  1        1 0.0581 "\u001b[31ml\u001b[39m" source
#>  2        1 0.133  "\u001b[31mi\u001b[39m" source
#>  3        1 0.110  "\u001b[31mb\u001b[39m" source
#>  4        1 0.0657 "\u001b[31mr\u001b[39m" source
#>  5        1 0.0507 "\u001b[31ma\u001b[39m" source
#>  6        1 0.0966 "\u001b[31mr\u001b[39m" source
#>  7        1 0.0998 "\u001b[31my\u001b[39m" source
#>  8        1 0.0790 "("                     source
#>  9        1 0.123  "m"                     source
#> 10        1 0.127  "a"                     source
#> # … with 102 more rows
